attributes.action: tighten contols of leagal acceptance of 0800 reverse calls, enforce the provider to give detailed information on  charges and how to block these calls before accepting such calls,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
prank and unwanted reverse charge calls.
these often get accepted by my young children who anwser the call and inadvertently accept the charge with no idea what they are agreeing to.
 in no other circumstance could a provider leagally accept a financial agreement from a young child without a signature from a gardian,
 however i still get billed by my service provider despite this unwanted service being instegated by a 3rd party(the 0800 reverse company).
  
 the charges for this service are not given before agreement and at the time of these calls no information on how to block this unwanted intrusion are given.

although the service is extremely useful in emergency circumstances
i feel controls are not tight enough and leave this system open to abuse which targets the recipient financially
and continued abuse destroys the original intent of the system.
 i feel the provider (0800 reverse) is disenclined to empose further voluntary controls or clearly state how to block these calls as this affects their profit and that of the telephone service provider.

please sign up if you feel that you have been unfairly charged for unwanted or malicious calls.
